code: import React from"react";import{v4 as uuidv4}from"uuid";import{PieChart,Pie,Cell,ResponsiveContainer}from"recharts";import s from"../Charts.module.scss";import Dot from"../../../../components/Dot/Dot";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var chartsSettings={donut:{data:[{name:'Custom Classes',value:300,color:'#FFC405'},{name:'Different Types',value:400,color:'#FF5668'},{name:'Credit Card',value:400,color:'#AF478A'}]}};var RechartsPieChart=function RechartsPieChart(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{height:"316px"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ResponsiveContainer,{width:"100%",height:200,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PieChart,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Pie,{data:chartsSettings.donut.data,innerRadius:50,outerRadius:80,dataKey:"value",children:chartsSettings.donut.data.map(function(entry,index){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Cell,{fill:entry.color},"cell-".concat(index));})})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:s.donutLabels,children:chartsSettings.donut.data.map(function(entry,index){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:s.label,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Dot,{color:entry.color}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"body-3 ml-2",children:entry.name})]},uuidv4());})})]});};export default RechartsPieChart;
